annotations:
Dear all,
Please offer suitable biz for our following ladY:
M.V. PENGHU SW – OPEN AT Guayaquil, Ecuador – AROUND 16/19Th Aug 2024 (PIC: TAN TIEN SU)
EST. BOD ABOUT 110 METRIC TONS LSMGO (sulphur below 0.1%) AND ABOUT 625 METRIC TONS VLSFO (sulphur
below 0.5%)
5 last cargo: SOYBEAN MEAL/ STEEL PRODUCTS/STEEL COIL/ CANOLA/ STEEL COIL
M.V. PENGHU SW
TYPE: BULK CARRIER (BOX SHAPED)
CLASS: BV
FLAG: PANAMA
BUILT: JUN 2011 JAPAN
CALL SIGN: H9FR
P & I: BRITANNIA
DWT / DRAFT: 37,168 MT / 10.85 M
LOA / LBP: 177.85 M / 169.80 M
BEAM / DEPTH: 28.60 M / 15.00 M
GT / NT: 22,852 / 12,535
CUBIC CAPACITIES IN CBM (BALE / GRAIN):
NO.1: 6417.83M3 / 6493.83M3
NO.2: 9954.96M3 / 10081.29M3
NO.3: 10003.24M3 / 10105.33M3
NO.4: 9965.70M3 / 10067.43M3
NO.5: 8952.68M3 / 9042.88M3
TTL: 45,294.41 M3 / 45,790.76 M3
CARGO GEAR: CRANES 30 MT X 26 M/R X 4 SETS ; OUTREACH 11.7M
HOLD / HATCHES: 5 / 5
SIZE OF HATCHES:
NO. 1) 15.20 M X 20.00 M
NO. 2 ~ 5) 22.40 M X 24.00 M
HATCH COVER: END FOLDING TYPE
LOAD STRENGTH:
- TANKTOP: UNVVLSFORM NO. 1, 3 & 5) 20 MT/M2; NO. 2 & 4) 13 MT/M2
SPEED AND CONSUMPTIONS:
AT SEA:
BALLAST: ABOUT 13.5 KTS ON ABOUT 23.5MTS VLSFO AND 0.1 MT LSMGO
LADEN: ABOUT 13.0 KTS ON ABOUT 24.5 MTS VLSFO AND 0.1 MT LSMGO
ALTERNATIVE ECO SPEED ONLY APPLICABLE WITH BIMCO SLOW STEAMING CLAUSE:
BALLAST: ABT 12.2 KNOTS ON 17.5 MTS VLSFO AND 0.1 MT LSMGO
LADEN: ABT 11.6 KNOTS ON 18.5 MTS VLSFO AND 0.1 MT LSMGO
IN PORT:
WORKING: ABT 3.2 MTS VLSFO AND ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO
IDLE: ABT 2.0 MTS VLSFO AND ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO
HOLD VENTILATION: AXIAL FLOW FAN 4 TIMES/HR
CO2 IN HOLDS
ABOVE SPEED/CONSUMPTION ARE UNDER GOOD WEATHER WHICH IS DEFINED AS MAX BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3, AND NO ADVERSE CURRENT/NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL.
VSL CONSUMES LSMGO IN MAIN AND AUX ENGINES FOR MANOEUVRING, START/STOP, CHANGE OVER OPERATIONS, NAVIGATING CANALS/RIVERS/NARROW WATERS/FOGS ETC. ABOVE SPEED & CONS IS NOT APPLICABLE WHILE
VSL STEAMING/STAYING IN ECA AREAS/PORTS ON LSMGO.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT GIVEN IN GOOD FAITH AND ECO SPEED/CONS ARE ALWAYS WOG.
++++
Please to hear
Best Regards,
Axle
Marine Pte Ltd
A : 133 New Bridge Road, Chinatown Point #15-06, Singapore 059413.
